title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field that has three types of content (HTML text within <html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and text with RTF tags), the content type has no effect.
EB: The dynamic text element should render the content based on its type, displaying HTML text properly within <html> tags, rendering HTML fragments as expected, and properly handling text with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set up a database field with the three types of content mentioned.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Verify that the expected rendering is not applied based on the content type.
